price: Sema: Mwaonaje ikikufikieni hiyo adhabu yake usiku au mchana, sehemu gani ya adhabu wanaihimiza wakosefu?
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَتَىٰكُمۡ عَذَابُهُۥ بَيَٰتًا أَوۡ نَهَارٗا مَّاذَا يَسۡتَعۡجِلُ مِنۡهُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ
footnotes: Waambie wanao himiza ifike adhabu: Hebu niambieni, ikikufikieni adhabu ya Mwenyezi Mungu usiku au mchana, pana faida gani watayo ipata wakosefu wenye madhambi kutaka ije kwa haraka? Na hali adhabu yote ni mbaya!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in atākum ʿadhābuhu bayātan aw nahāran mādhā yastaʿjilu min'hu al-muj'rimūna
